recipes.name: Hamachi Crudo
recipes.description: Fresh hamachi with spicy citrus broth, hyssop oil, and ras el hanout

components.name: Spicy Citrus Broth
instructions: Juice lemons and limes, strain seeds
Combine citrus juice, ginger, chiles, fish sauce, and sugar

components.name: Fennel Oil (Hyssop Oil)
instructions: Blanch hyssop leaves in boiling water for 10 seconds
Blend with olive oil on high speed for 2 minutes

components.name: Hamachi Slices
instructions: Keep hamachi ice cold at all times
Slice against the grain at a 45° angle
Each slice should be about 1/4 inch thick
Cover with damp towel and plastic wrap
Store on ice, use same day

components.name: Marinated Citrus
instructions: Supreme the citrus (remove all pith and membrane)
Toss segments gently with olive oil and salt

plating: Arrange 5 hamachi slices in center of chilled plate
Spoon 70g spicy citrus broth around fish
Dust lightly with ras el hanout
Garnish with micro cilantro and fennel tops
Finish with flaky sea salt and chili flake

recipes.name: Olives and Almonds
recipes.description: Toasted marcona almonds with marinated olives, mandarin orange, and chili

components.name: Toasted Almonds
instructions: Toss almonds with olive oil and salt
Spread on sheet pan in single layer

components.name: Marinated Olives
instructions: Combine olives, oil, garlic, rosemary, chili
Store refrigerated, bring to room temp before serving

plating: Garnish with fresh Thai bird chile slice

recipes.name: Blue Cheese Olives
recipes.description: Gordal olives stuffed with goat milk blue cheese, sherry reduction, hazelnuts

components.name: Blue Cheese Stuffing
instructions: Soften blue cheese and cream cheese to room temp

components.name: Pedro RDX (Sherry Reduction)
instructions: Combine sherry vinegar and sugar in saucepan
Cool and store in squeeze bottle

components.name: Chopped Hazelnuts
instructions: Rub in towel to remove skins

plating: Arrange 5 stuffed olives in small bowl

recipes.name: Rainbow Fingerling Potatoes
recipes.description: Thick cut roasted potatoes with rosemary, garlic confit, and malt vinegar salt

components.name: Parboiled Potatoes
instructions: Wash potatoes, cut in half lengthwise

components.name: Garlic Confit
instructions: Place peeled garlic in small pot
Cook on low heat 45 minutes until soft

components.name: Rosemary Vinegar Salt
instructions: Mix salt, vinegar powder, and rosemary

plating: Preheat cast iron pan over high heat
Sear parboiled potatoes cut-side down until crispy
Add 3 garlic confit cloves, let caramelize
Garnish with sliced scallions and fresh rosemary

recipes.name: Shaved Fennel Caesar
recipes.description: Shaved fennel with classic caesar dressing, pangrattato, and anchovies

components.name: Pangrattato
instructions: Toast until golden brown, stirring constantly
Cool and store in airtight container

components.name: Caesar Dressing
instructions: Mince garlic and anchovies to paste

plating: Toss fennel with caesar dressing (2 oz)

recipes.name: 7-rows Koginut Pumpkin and Burrata
recipes.description: Roasted pumpkin with burrata, chanterelles, pumpkin seed brittle

components.name: Poached Squash
instructions: Peel and cut squash into 1-inch pieces
Melt butter in pan with thyme
Add squash, cover, cook gently 15 minutes

components.name: Pumpkin Puree
instructions: Blend with butter and salt until smooth

components.name: Roasted Chanterelles
instructions: Sauté in hot pan with olive oil

plating: Spread 3 tbsp pumpkin puree on plate
Tear burrata and place on squash

recipes.name: Wagyu Hot Dog
recipes.description: Premium wagyu hotdog with truffle chimichurri, kewpie mayo, red cabbage slaw

components.name: Red Cabbage Slaw
instructions: Mix vinegar, sugar, salt until dissolved

components.name: Crunchy Beef Mix
instructions: Toss chips with tallow and garlic powder

recipes.name: Australian Beef French Dip Sandwich
recipes.description: Roasted eye round beef with au jus, horseradish sauce, on french roll

components.name: Roast Beef
instructions: Season beef generously with salt, pepper, garlic
Sear on all sides in hot pan

components.name: Au Jus
instructions: Roast beef bones at 400°F until brown

plating: Spread swiss spread on both sides
Warm 100g sliced roast beef in au jus
Serve with 4 oz au jus in ramekin for dipping

recipes.name: Slaw Ingredients
recipes.title: Slaw Ingredients

ingredients.name: Red Cabbage, Mandoline sliced paper-thin	5	pounds
Chive End Batons , Cut into 1-inch batons, added just before service for texture |	4	ounces
Pickling Liquid (The House-Made Brine - Yields  cups)
| Fresh Thyme | 6 sprigs | Earthy, subtle herbaceous note |	6	springs

instructions: Combine the sliced Cabbage in a large, non-reactive container.

recipes.name: Pour the cooled Pickling Liquid over the vegetables.
recipes.title: Pour the cooled Pickling Liquid over the vegetables.
recipes.description: Allow the slaw to sit, covered and refrigerated, for a minimum of 4 hours, or ideally overnight, before service.

ingredients.name: | Kewpie Mayonnaise | Japanese-style mayonnaise | Placed in a fine-tipped squeeze bottle for precise application. |
This textural mix adds salinity, depth, and a high-end crunch.
| Beef Chicharrones | Finely diced, crispy rendered beef cracklings | Must be completely dry and crunchy. Keep stored in an airtight container. |
| Kettle Potato Chips | High-quality, thin, salted chips | Coarsely crush into small shards just before service. |
| Fried Shallots | Thinly sliced, deep golden brown shallots | Fry until deeply golden and crisp, drain well. Keep stored in an airtight container. |
